text: Joyce Elaine MacKenzie Hassing (October 13, 1925 June 10, 2021) was an American actress. She appeared on movie and television from 1946 to 1961. She is best remembered for being the eleventh actress to portray Jane. She played the role opposite Lex Barker's Tarzan in 1953's Tarzan and the She-Devil. She died on June 10, 2021 in Hollywood, California, at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Actors from California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors
title: Joyce MacKenzie
